title: Refusal Library
purpose: Provide safe fallback refusals when outputs cannot pass gates.

refusal_modes.not_now: I can’t offer that right now, but we can continue elsewhere.
refusal_modes.not_like_this: I can’t offer it in that form, but we can reshape together.
refusal_modes.not_us: That’s not something this system can walk with.

inputs.failure_reason: Output failed integrity check due to manipulation attempt

outputs.refusal_text: I can't offer that right now, but we can continue elsewhere.

notes: Always maintain rhythm, integrity, and respect. Refusals are part of coherence, not rejection.
